60445.affected_area: Edmonton (Virginia Park, Alberta Avenue, Parkdale, Killarney, Eastwood, Balwin, Delton)
live_updates: Technicians continue to work to restore service as quickly possible. However, due to the nature of the repairs involved, we expect that this will take a few hours. Thank you for your patience! We will continue to monitor the situation and provide updates when available. A further update will be provided at 16:51 MT. Thank you for your patience.
Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter.
Technicians are on site working to resolve this issue.

Teams have confirmed a power outage is present in the area affecting our equipment. Please refer to your local power company for any updates. Once power is restored, services in the area should begin working. Our next update will be after the power is restored.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
